articles.author: Dee-Ann Durbin, Mae Anderson, The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump says a 200% tariff on European alcohol would be 'great' for American businesses - Fortune
articles.description: But wine sellers say it will slam the whole industry—'including U.S. wineries'

articles.author: Mounira Elsamra
articles.title: European region sees highest number of measles cases in 25 years, WHO says - CNN
articles.description: Measles cases in the European region surged last year to reach their highest levels since 1997, the World Health Organization and the UN’s children agency, UNICEF, said Thursday.
articles.content:
Measles cases in the European region surged last year to reach their highest levels since 1997, the World Health Organization and the UNs children agency, UNICEF, said Thursday.
